title: President condoles death of former MNA Asghar Shah
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari Thursday expressed grief over the demise of former member National Assembly from Bahawalnagar Syed Asghar Ali Shah.
He sympathized with the family of the late politician.
He prayed for the deceased and for grant of patience to the bereaved family.
